intro.title: Winning major efficiencies in the fulfillment workflow
text: existing workflow - review all orders and purchase labels in advance, printed and attached to pack slip - / buying shipping labels upfront at beginning of each day / scenario of shop could spend $10,000s labels, hand to fulfill staff / estimates / high error rate / refunds / who had purchasing power / transfer trust and responsibility to fulfill staff / USPS stricter on weight + dimensions / adjustments charges / overages / rules on combine - not combine / strain on intake

intro.thumb02Caption: Discount Divas live studio lighting equipment

text: process is to start at low resolution (stickies) and capture a volumn of user flows and potential layouts, product assumptions, user feedback, / use artifacts to capture and share for team alignment

pictures of workstations / IDEO testing notes / interview shop owners / no 'would you ...' questions / do they trust fulfill staff already ? / guerilla / stakeholder interviews, understand existing pain points / shop interviews / research existing solution / label purchasing decisions / staff with admin and purchasing power / daily review and estimation based on combined orders / what is an order - session ? / previous interviews and workshopping with shops / fulfillment rep/ teamed up with Product to interview shop owners and fulfillment staff / Usable Equitable - diverse abilities / Enjoyable - research / Useful

hybrid flow / support both workflows / hybrid workflows / barcode scanner events / logistics / learning from others who do it every day / suit the scale / user flow / real-time / scope / least disruptive / extend for UPS and Fedex
minimize errors in shipping label purchasing and maximize the efficiency in dealing with errors in the pick, pack, ship fulfillment flow
mainly barcode scanning with UI support / package settings / fulfill UI / changes to payments UI / heuristics / global vs component
new dashboard / visible at a distance - mac air small screens / av items per package / card states / data points / shows progress for both scanning and packaging each order
testing the settings dependencies component for interaction and wording / early prototypes shared to facebook groups / First version release
testing the settings dependencies component for interaction and wording / early prototypes shared to facebook groups / First version release
